name: Radial velocity: Watching for wobble
description: Orbiting planets cause stars to wobble in space, changing the color of the light astronomers observe.
effects_description: Your crew has discovered 3 additional exoplanets you can visit.

name: Transit: Searching for Sahdows
description: When a planet passes directly between its star and an observer, it dims the star's light by a measureable amount.
effects_description: Your crew has discovered 2 exoplanets you can visit.

name: Direct imaging: Taking Pictures
description: Astronomers can take pictures of exoplanets by removing the overwhelming glare of the stars they orbit.
effects_description: Your crew has discovered 1 additional exoplanets you can visit.

name: Gravitational Microlensing: Light in a Gravity Lens
description: Light from a distant star is bent and focused by gravity as a planet passes between the star and Earth.
effects_description: Your crew has discovered 2 additional exoplanets you can visit.

name: Astrometry: Minuscule movements
description: The orbit of a planet can cause a star to wobble around in space in relation to nearby stars in the sky.
effects_description: Your crew has discovered 1 additional exoplanet you can visit.

name: Database error
description: The database of the navigator has incorrect positions of some exoplanets which are now out of ranges
effects_description: You have 2 less exoplanets for visit.

name: Bad input
description: Your pilot made a mistake introducing the next coordenates.
effects_description: Choose randomly the next exoplanet

name: Huge solar storm

description: Solar storm hit the ship recharging the batterys.

name: A comet
description: You pass near a comet. Its not relevant, but its beatifull

description: An asteroid hit the ship causing several damages.

name: Supernova

description: When light from a star travels through the atmosphere of an orbiting planet and reaches our telescopes tells about where it's been.

name: Too close!
description: You must avoid the impact of a huge asteroid

name: Distant Supernova

name: Nebula Crossing
description: Your ship enters a dense nebula, affecting your sensors and requiring more energy to navigate.
